name: Save the light (Tangente)
description:
A level design game made in unity with a friend (https://galofrn.itch.io) the proyect was part of a task for the university, it was really fun making  it, hope you like this small proyect of ours.

since this is an older proyect of the original, it has an error at the end that i'll be solving when i can update the version of the game.
